page.title: 06Education.
page.content: It all starts in playgroup when you are three years old. Playgroup helps young children get used to being with other people and sharing things with them. At the age of five the children come to the First school. It is not a very big school, it has three classes and three teachers, one of them being the headmistress. It has a large dining room which is also used for drama and P.E. We have swimming lessons every Tuesday morning for the older children. We study different project work each half term. Every year we have an Easter Fair and a Sponsored Walk to raise money for school funds. We sometimes go on trips to the theatre to museums or other places of interest. At nine we go to Corbridge Middle and at thirteen to Hexham High School.
